home.title: I'm Victor Ccanchi
home.subtitle: Hello, World!
home.description2: I build fast, scalable and modern web interfaces with a strong focus on performance and user experience.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Let me introduce myself
about.description: Hi! I'm Victor, a frontend-focused developer from Lima, Peru. I build modern, scalable and user-centered web interfaces using JavaScript, TypeScript and contemporary frameworks. I enjoy transforming ideas into real products by combining clean architecture, performance and thoughtful UI/UX.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: I am a web developer specialized in frontend technologies. I enjoy creating intuitive user interfaces, ensuring smooth interaction and consistent performance. My expertise includes JavaScript, TypeScript and frameworks such as React, Vue and Lit, combined with strong knowledge of styling systems and development best practices.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Experienced in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Vue.js, Lit, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, and modern tools used to build efficient and high-quality web applications.

resume.title: Resume
resume.subtitle: More About My Credentials
resume.description: Explore my professional experience and educational background, showcasing my commitment to growth and high-quality software development.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.description-1: Contributed to the development of modern web applications using technologies such as Lit, JavaScript and TypeScript. Built reusable UI components, improved application performance and collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable solutions for enterprise environments.
experience.description-2: Reviewed and evaluated AI-generated code, providing actionable feedback to improve correctness, performance and best-practice adoption. Identified proper and improper use of tools, helping improve internal AI models and contributing to higher-quality code generation.
experience.description-3: Designed and built custom web solutions for various clients using React, Node.js and MongoDB. Delivered responsive UIs, optimized performance and ensured seamless communication between frontend and backend services.

education.title: Education
education.title-1: Professional Certificate in Full Stack Web Development
education.description-1: Completed an intensive program focused on modern web development, including React, Node.js, Express and MongoDB. Developed hands-on experience building scalable applications and applying software engineering best practices.
education.description-2: Studied core concepts of electronics, circuit design and programming, building analytical and problem-solving skills which strengthened my transition to software engineering.
education.description-3: Developed a solid foundation in technical problem-solving, project management and analytical reasoning—skills that later supported my transition into the software development field.

certificates.title: Certificates
certificates.description: A collection of certifications that validate my continuous learning and expertise in modern web development and software engineering.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.subtitle: I'd love to hear from you.
contact.description: Feel free to reach out for collaboration, questions or new opportunities—I’m always open to connecting!
